name: Pre-Teen Wasteland
description:
This program will look best on a Game Boy Color, 
but you should still be able to enjoy it whatever method you use!
BUGS:
The "Audio Mode" should work pretty well. Unfortunately, visual mode has some bugs including not being able to exit out of certain videos without restarting the program (one doesn't even play the music for some reason). These are marked in the program with an exclamation point. It's probably worth a reset to check 'em out, though!

PRE-TEEN WASTELAND
A MUSIC CARTRIDGE EP BY SLOOPYGOOP

CREDITS:
Pre-Teen Wasteland by Sloopygoop
All music tracked for Game Boy by Sloopygoop (Andrew Davis)
Tracks 1, 3, 5, and 6 composed by Sloopygoop.
Tracks 2, 4, and 7 are covers/remixes of existing works by Daft Punk, Queen, Rebecca Sugar and co, Dua Lipa, Georges Bizet, and The Who.
Track 7 is 100% indebted to a sheet music scribe at Hal Leonard.
The artwork for tracks 2, 3, and 7 was sourced from various parts of the internet/a Far Side calendar. All other artwork is original, minus the fonts used. UI font is by Jeremy Oduber: https://jeremyoduber.itch.io/fonts-for-gb-studio
I'm actually not a giant fan of The Far Side.
Kirby's costume is not accurate to the character in the opera.
Special thanks to Rulz, Ember, and the GBStudio Discord group.
Special thanks to Cory Kram for all the encouragement.
Made in 2021 for GBComp21 using GB Studio by Chris Maltby
sloopygoop.bandcamp.com
sloopygoop at gmail.com
ig: @sloopy_goop
t: @sloopygoop
Please contact me if you'd like to use the MOD files in your own projects.
